H0.text: What is the common name of the flowering plant Kniphofia. Red Hot Poker

H1.text: What is the common name of the flowering plant Kniphofia. Torch Lily

H2.text: What is the common name of the flowering plant Kniphofia. Poker Plant

H3.text: What is the common name of the flowering plant Kniphofia. Triocles

A4.text: Common names include tritoma, red hot poker, torch lily and poker plant.
